title: Bug 41347CCombo shouldn't fire defaultSelection on mouse list selection
description: Bug 41347CCombo shouldn't fire defaultSelection on mouse list selection. It shouldn't do this. A typical user of a combobox would be very surprised to have the dialog dismissed just because an entry was selected.
OB: Currently, the CCombo component fires a defaultSelection event when an entry is selected from the dropdown using the mouse.
EB: It should instead only fire a selection event when an entry is selected from the dropdown using the mouse. Default selection should only occur when the user hits enter from the text field.
SR:
1. Open the CCombo dropdown.
2. Use the mouse to select an entry.
3. Observe that a defaultSelection event is fired, and the dialog is dismissed, which is unexpected behavior.
